com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.domain.domain

Interface WebCmsDomainService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    WebCmsMultiDomainService

    public interface WebCmsDomainService
    Core API for retrieving domain data, with caching support. If you want to use domain-aware methods in a multi-domain context, you should use the WebCmsMultiDomainService instead. The latter extends this interface.
    Since:
    0.0.3
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    WebCmsMultiDomainService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WebCmsDomain getDomain(String objectId)
      Get the domain with that object id.
      WebCmsDomain getDomainByKey(String domainKey)
      Get the domain with the specified domain key.
      <U> U getMetadataForDomain(WebCmsDomain domain, Class<U> metadataType)
      Retrieve the metadata for a specific domain.

    • Method Detail

      • getDomain

        WebCmsDomain getDomain(String objectId)
        Get the domain with that object id.
        Parameters:
        objectId - of the domain
        Returns:
        domain or null if not found

      • getDomainByKey

        WebCmsDomain getDomainByKey(String domainKey)
        Get the domain with the specified domain key.
        Parameters:
        domainKey - of the domain
        Returns:
        domain or null if not found

      • getMetadataForDomain

        <U> U getMetadataForDomain(WebCmsDomain domain,
                           Class<U> metadataType)
        Retrieve the metadata for a specific domain. Coerce it to the given type. A ClassCastException will be thrown if the metadata is not of the right type.
        Parameters:
        domain - or null for the no-domain
        metadataType - type the metadata should have
        Returns:
        metadata or null if none available
